last_episode_to_air.name: House Of Pain / Antique Spirits
last_episode_to_air.overview: Season 3 concludes with a visit to an antique shop in Florida that ends up having something in common with John's museum.

name: Haunted Collector
overview:
Haunted Collector is an American television reality series which airs on the Syfy cable television channel. The first season premiered on June 1, 2011, and ended on July 6, 2011. The series features a team of paranormal investigators led by demonologist John Zaffis, who investigates alleged haunted locations with the hopes of identifying and removing any on-site artifacts or trigger objects that may be the source of the supposed paranormal or poltergeist activity.

The production of the second season started in December 2011, and premiered on June 6, 2012.

On September 17, 2012, Syfy announced that the series has been renewed for 12-episode third season, which premiered on March 6, 2013.

episodes.name: Haunted Bayou & Library Ghost
episodes.overview: The team delves under a house to find the source of a Lake Charles haunting; the Public Library in Deep River, Ct. holds a plethora of spooky occurrences.

episodes.name: My Mother's Ghost & Paranormal Predator
episodes.overview: John and his team travel to California, where a woman is concerned about the ghostly phenomena in her home. Later, they investigate the paranormal claims of a hunter and his girlfriend.

episodes.name: Burning Spirits & Ghosts of the West
episodes.overview: John and his team look into the haunted history of some Native American Artifacts on display at a New Mexico bar. Then, they investigate the alleged paranormal activity taking place in a hotel with a dark past.

episodes.name: The Sanitarium & Firehouse Phantom
episodes.overview: Case # 1 Donna Wagner in Stratford, CT, has had a ton of paranormal activity that includes seeing the apparition of a child, glass spontaneously shattering and her tenants getting scratched! Why is this happening all of a sudden? Donna is visibly shaken. In her home is an antique lamp that serves as a cigarette lighter, a pool table that belonged to the deceased former owner who had a troubled past, and a statue that the tenant had left behind: it was of her father, and it had been made in Belize. Could it be that the statue is cursed?? During the daytime sweep the team leave little cars in hopes of summoning the apparition of a child. They also marked the area with chalk to note any suspicious movements in the space. Meanwhile, John and Beth find they can't keep any batteries working in the basement, which could be attributed to a paranormal energy drain.

episodes.name: Uncivil Spirit & Revolutionary Ghost
episodes.overview: The team examines a Civil War-era "pain bullet" found in the backyard that may be causing paranormal activity in a house in Sharpsburg, Maryland. Then they travel to River Vale, New Jersey, site of the Baylor Massacre where a 21-year-old college student is the victim of the malevolent spirit of a British Revolutionary War soldier who keeps pinning him down to the bed while he sleeps. They also believe the owner's wood carved statue from the Bahamas ties in with the hauntings since the practice of obeah is steeped in sorcery and folk magic.

episodes.name: Slaughterhouse Ghosts & Supernatural Sword
episodes.overview: John and the crew meet a woman named Michelle from Fairfield, CT who is hearing banging noises and something is scratching her horses. Michelle lives in a loft apartment near the barn where she keeps her animals, which she relies on for income from children's parties. Her property is jam packed with antiques, a gargoyle and a bizarre wood carving that Michelle buried down the road. The team investigates the home of a man and woman named Eric and Jessica. Eric has been taunted and scratched by ghosts with no explanations! The torment has made such an impact that Jessica has actually left her husband. The dogs have gone crazy to the point where one of the dogs chewed off its own tail.

episodes.name: Farm Stalker / Echo Club Spirits
episodes.overview: A horse trainer in Montgomery, N.Y., fears for the safety of the animals on her farm in the third-season opener.

episodes.name: Cigar Bar Spirits / Child's Play
episodes.overview: David Riccio's cigar bar and cafe in Boston's North End has seen an increasing amount of paranormal activity. (Though the bizarre statues probably don't help spooked out people relax!) Claims are dishes flying, an antique coffee grinder spinning on its own, plates flying and something is knocking the coffee out of people's hands.

episodes.name: Ghost Behind Bars / Haunted Brothel
episodes.overview: An abandoned prison in Montana is investigated after workers make claims about being mysteriously scratched and hearing cell doors slam. Also: The team look into reports of a female apparition being spotted at a former brothel.

episodes.name: Island Of Fear / Tropical Terror
episodes.overview: John and the team visit Ponce de Leon's estate in Puerto Rico to investigate reports of disembodied apparitions.

episodes.name: Emmitt House Ghosts / Shadow Intruder
episodes.overview: The team visit the allegedly haunted Emmitt House in Waverly, Ohio; and investigate a coin with a dark past.

episodes.name: Spirits of Gettysburg / Headless Horseman
episodes.overview: Gettysburg, Pennsylvania and Winfield, West Virginia: two cities with war-inflicted tragedies in their paths and two cities with serious ghost problems.

episodes.name: Ghosts Of Geneva / Fort Fear
episodes.overview: Claims of aggressive paranormal activity made by visitors to Fort Wayne in Detroit are investigated by John and his team during a trip to the historic site.

episodes.name: Shadow Boxer / Ghost Storm
episodes.overview: Claims about the ghosts of two girls haunting a Missouri community center are investigated by John and his team.

episodes.name: Lakeside Terror / Pythian Secrets
episodes.overview: John and his team try to determine why guests are running scared from an inn in Arkansas. Also: A castle in Missouri is investigated.

episodes.name: Hollywood Haunting / Gold Rush Ghost
episodes.overview: John Zaffis and the crew fly to California to investigate a Hollywood Hills home once occupied by movie legend Orson Welles and other celebrities including Peter Lorre, Sydney Toler and Oscar winning songwriter Paul Williams.

episodes.name: Haunted Seminary / Ghost Games
episodes.overview: John discovers something spooky in a family's basement. The team also investigate a seminary that's allegedly haunted.

episodes.name: House Of Pain / Antique Spirits
episodes.overview: Season 3 concludes with a visit to an antique shop in Florida that ends up having something in common with John's museum.
